testcase.name: Log in using correct email and correct password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter email@email.com and password................................passed And click login button......................................................passed Then user is redirected to Landingpage......................................passed And user is notified of successfull login...................................passed

testcase.name: Log in using incorrect email and password combination
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter incorrectemail@email.com and password.......................passed And click login button......................................................passed Then error message is shown.................................................passed

testcase.name: Log in using incorrect email and password combination 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enter email@email.com and incorrectpassword.......................passed And click login button......................................................passed Then error message is shown.................................................passed
